I had the 1.0.4.0 patch installed with the Razor1911 crack supplied by Mbb, then I installed this (from UpdateTitle.exe if that matters) and I didn't even need to apply the crack again. Internet works and everything's fine, though the frame rate dropped quite a bit (probably because Opera was running in the back).

Amen to new shadows. No more pixelated ugliness - even using the GFX tweak isn't necessary anymore. Also, finally no more need for that Social Club drek running in the background. Though it takes time until you get to the game with the new launcher and all... Still, a pretty sweet patch.

For those who have "The ordinal 5365  could not be located in the dynamic link library" problem (like I had) after applying the crack, make sure you have the latest version of Xliveless installed (atm it is 0.999b1). Older version might not work for this patch.

WHY EVERYBODY CALLS THE xlive.dll AS xliveless.dll????
@itttakary mine did the same, if your running win7 right click the launcher and properties, you'll see compatibility, run it in windows xp SP3
so the latest is 1.0.6.0 and the previous is 1.0.5.0 ? there is no 1.0.5.0 ??

@computer-guy 

Sometimes, People name it xliveless.dll to distinguish the different dll's. But, you do have to rename xliveless.dll to xlive.dll
